content: repeat round 5 fasten_off color b round 7 join color c in any corner space chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space work double_crochet in ea double_crochet and corner around working 5 double_crochet in ea corner space and ending with 2 double_crochet in same space as beg chain-3 join with slip_stitch fasten_off color c 92 double_crochet set square aside and make three more squares the same join squares hold 2 granny squares with wrong sides together attach color c at right corner of piece and slip_stitch across through inside loop of each st working through both thicknesses fasten_off join other 2 squares the same way center panel note 2 row half_double_crochet in blo = 1 rib row 1 holding one 2-square piece with right side facing you attach color b at top right corner of piece chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea double_crochet and seam st across turn 49 half_double_crochet row 2 working in back loops only blo chain 2 half_double_crochet in blo of ea half_double_crochet across turn 49 half_double_crochet row 3-7 repeat row 2 49 half_double_crochet row 8 joining row holding second 2-square piece right sides together with center panel slip_stitch through both loops of each st and seam st across working through both thicknesses 49 half_double_crochet 2 fasten_off color b edging rounds round 1 attach color b in any corner space on last round of one granny square chain 3 double_crochet evenly around working double_crochet in each double_crochet and in each row end of center panel working 3 double_crochet in ea corner double_crochet end with 2 double_crochet in beg corner space join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 approx 220 double_crochet drop color b pull loop of color a through loop on hook round 2 with color a chain 1 single_crochet in ea double_crochet around working 3 single_crochet in ea corner double_crochet join with slip_stitch pulling color b through loop on hook 228 double_crochet cut color a and continue with color b round 3 with color b chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea single_crochet around working 3 half_double_crochet in ea corner single_crochet join with slip_stitch turn 236 half_double_crochet round 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet in back loop only blo of ea half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch turn 244 half_double_crochet round 5 repeat round 4 fasten_off color b join color c 252 half_double_crochet do not turn round 6 with color c chain 1 single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet around working 3 single_crochet in ea corner half_double_crochet join with slip_stitch 260 half_double_crochet final edging round boy version chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around working 3 single_crochet in ea corner st join with slip_stitch 268 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends girl version shell edging beginning in corner single_crochet chain 3 work 4 double_crochet in same single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet *work 5 double_crochet in next single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet repeat from * around working 7 double_crochet in ea corner and ending by working 3 double_crochet in last corner join
